title: Reddie
subtitle: Custom UI for Saving Reddit Comments
details: Reddit with a visually enhanced post-saving interface. Developed with JavaScript, React, Express, Node.js, MongoDB, and hosted on Heroku.

title: Resume Equalizer
subtitle: Separates PDF Text into Parts of Speech
details: Analyze job descriptions with Python, NLP, and JavaScript. PDF upload transforms them into organized word banks.

title: What's Next
subtitle: Posting Complaint Form and Data Table
details: Report misleading job postings and view submitted complaints in a table. Built with Next.js, PostgreSQL, Prisma, and deployed on Heroku.

title: Stepping Stones
subtitle: Multi-Step Sign-up for Bootcamp Grads
details: MERN-stack application for bootcamp graduates to network. Features user authentication, React Hook Forms, and Styled Components.
